DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine effect WelChol tablets serum lipid , lipoprotein , apolipoproteins , lipoprotein particle size patient stabilize simvastatin therapy least 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Effect WelChol Tablets Cholesterol Patients Who Have Been Taking Simvastatin Least 4 Weeks .
DOC.criteria: Males female > = 18 year age On stable dose simvastatin 4 week LDLC > = 115 mg/dL < = 250 mg/dL TG < 300 mg/dL Women pregnant breastfeeding planning become pregnant Women hysterectomy tubal ligation post menopausal practice acceptable method contraception BMI > 40 Allergic colesevelam HCl History swallow disorder History gastrointestinal motility disorder Any disorder might interfere study History drug alcohol abuse
